title: Ragavendra Raja
author: Ragavendra Raja
content: The current CEO of Cosmos is Peng Zhong that supplanted Jae Kwon. Universe moved to its mainnet in April 2021 after it was at first sent off on the Ethereum blockchain. Universe center gives the interchains that are required for the elements of sovereign blockchains inside the Cosmos environment.Cosmos (ATOM) Price Prediction 2022we can see that the cost of Cosmos (ATOM) was going between $26.362 at the resistance4 level and $21.908 at the resistance2 level, in the beyond a couple of weeks, and afterward contacted the $5.512 support2 level and $8.734 support1 level.In the interim, our drawn-out ATOM Price prediction for 2022 is bullish since it could break numerous mental protections. We can anticipate that ATOM should reach $40 this year.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: Ragavendra Raja on September 14, 2022, 06:09:27 AMWe can anticipate that ATOM should reach $40 this year.It has reached $44 as its ATH last year. Being able to be staked is going to play a big factor on it because everyone in the market is an investor and a speculator. But to be honest, looking at its price of $14 today and looking to see it back on $40 for this year. I don't see it happening, the market situation is what every project is reliant on.And if we're going to consider it, the market doesn't look good and it may take time before it's seen back on its former ath.

comments.author: AnonBitCoiner
comments.body: I really like Cosmos system . Theirs sex are very fast and fee is very low. I staked some Cosmos and it give me good apy. There are much more airdrop with high price for Cosmos Stakers like evmos. I think it's price will pump more because of these features. Now it's trading with price 13.7$ and I expecting 30$ in the end of 2022 and 100$ for next two years.

comments.author: Maverick574
comments.body: i think cosmos is best project for holding. I have bought some cosmos and staked in keplr wallet. But unfortunately my wallet has been hacked & i lost my fund.
